data.claim: Duro Eval Metrics Baseline (2026-02-18): 171 decisions (71 real, 100 smoke-test), 162 unverified, 7 validated, 2 reversed. Review rate: 5.3%. Unverified rate: 94.7%. Reopen rate: 22.2%. 10 decisions need review. 347 episodes (47 real). 353 evaluations (mostly Grade A smoke-tests).
data.snippet: Computed from duro_status, duro_query_memory, duro_list_unreviewed_decisions. Key insight: high unverified rate (94.7%) means decision feedback loops are not closing. Reopen rate (22.2%) based on 2 reversed out of 9 validated.
